## Getting Started 

### Swift Package Manager

```swift
  .package(url: "https://github.com/XYOracleNetwork/sdk-base-swift.git", from: "1.0.3")
```

### Requirements
- iOS 11.0+
- Xcode 10.1+
- Swift 4.2+
